## Game.(constructor)

Base constructor for `Game<TPlayer>`<!-- -->. You need to pass in your player type here so that BGE knows how to make instances of it.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected constructor(PlayerType: {
        new (): TPlayer;
    });
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  PlayerType | { new (): TPlayer; } | Constructor for your custom player type. |
